remarks: An even more direct relationship than ~ r1tskina to get an inaccessible cardinal out of a Tarski class: the size of any nonempty Tarski class is an inaccessible cardinal.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jun-2013.)
statement: tskcard $p |- ( ( T e. Tarski /\ T =/= (/) ) -> ( card ` T ) e. Inacc ) $.
